Bash("C:\\Users\\orgel\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python314\\python.exe" << 'PYEOF'
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import math

def create_icon\(size\):
    img = Image.new\('RGBA', \(size, size\), \(0, 0, 0, 0\)\)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(img\)
    s = size / 256  # scale factor
    
    # Background: rounded dark square with subtle gradient feel
    # Dark blue-black background
    bg_color = \(18, 18, 26, 255\)
    border_color = \(78, 205, 196, 255\)  # accent teal
    
    # Draw rounded rect background
    margin = int\(8 * s\)
    r = int\(40 * s\)
    draw.rounded_rectangle\([margin, margin, size-margin, size-margin], radius=r, fill=bg_color, outline=border_color, width=max\(1, int\(3*s\)\)\)
    
    # === ORGAN PIPES \(left side\) ===
    pipe_color = \(200, 200, 220, 255\)
    pipe_highlight = \(230, 230, 245, 255\)
    pipe_shadow = \(120, 120, 150, 255\)
    
    # 5 organ pipes of different heights
    pipe_x_start = int\(40 * s\)
    pipe_width = int\(22 * s\)
    pipe_gap = int\(6 * s\)
    pipe_bottom = int\(200 * s\)
    pipe_heights = [130, 155, 170, 150, 120]  # pixel heights at 256
    
    for i, h in enumerate\(pipe_heights\):
        x = pipe_x_start + i * \(pipe_width + pipe_gap\)
        top = pipe_bottom - int\(h * s\)
        
        # Pipe body
        draw.rectangle\([x, top, x + pipe_width, pipe_bottom], fill=pipe_color, outline=pipe_shadow, width=max\(1, int\(1*s\)\)\)
        
        # Highlight stripe \(left side of pipe\)
        hl_w = max\(1, int\(4 * s\)\)
        draw.rectangle\([x + max\(1, int\(2*s\)\), top + max\(1, int\(2*s\)\), x + hl_w + max\(1, int\(2*s\)\), pipe_bottom - max\(1, int\(2*s\)\)], fill=pipe_highlight\)
        
        # Pipe mouth \(darker rectangle near bottom\)
        mouth_h = int\(12 * s\)
        mouth_top = pipe_bottom - int\(30 * s\)
        draw.rectangle\([x + max\(1, int\(3*s\)\), mouth_top, x + pipe_width - max\(1, int\(3*s\)\), mouth_top + mouth_h], fill=\(60, 60, 80, 255\)\)
        
        # Pipe top cap \(slightly wider\)
        cap_extend = max\(1, int\(3 * s\)\)
        cap_h = max\(2, int\(6 * s\)\)
        draw.rectangle\([x - cap_extend, top - cap_h, x + pipe_width + cap_extend, top], fill=pipe_shadow\)
        draw.rectangle\([x - cap_extend, top - cap_h, x + pipe_width + cap_extend, top - cap_h + max\(1, int\(2*s\)\)], fill=pipe_highlight\)
    
    # Pipe base/windchest
    base_left = pipe_x_start - int\(8 * s\)
    base_right = pipe_x_start + 5 * \(pipe_width + pipe_gap\) - pipe_gap + int\(8 * s\)
    base_top = pipe_bottom
    base_bottom = pipe_bottom + int\(16 * s\)
    draw.rectangle\([base_left, base_top, base_right, base_bottom], fill=\(80, 80, 100, 255\), outline=pipe_shadow, width=max\(1, int\(1*s\)\)\)
    draw.rectangle\([base_left, base_top, base_right, base_top + max\(1, int\(3*s\)\)], fill=pipe_highlight\)
    
    # === MICROPHONE \(right side\) ===
    mic_cx = int\(195 * s\)
    mic_cy = int\(100 * s\)
    
    # Mic head \(capsule\) - ellipse
    mic_w = int\(30 * s\)
    mic_h = int\(42 * s\)
    mic_color = \(78, 205, 196, 255\)  # teal accent
    mic_dark = \(40, 140, 135, 255\)
    mic_light = \(120, 230, 220, 255\)
    
    draw.ellipse\([mic_cx - mic_w, mic_cy - mic_h, mic_cx + mic_w, mic_cy + mic_h], fill=mic_color, outline=mic_dark, width=max\(1, int\(2*s\)\)\)
    
    # Mic grille lines
    for j in range\(-3, 4\):
        y = mic_cy + int\(j * 10 * s\)
        x1 = mic_cx - int\(math.sqrt\(max\(0, mic_w**2 - \(j*10*s\)**2 * \(mic_w/mic_h\)**2\)\) * 0.85\)
        x2 = mic_cx + int\(math.sqrt\(max\(0, mic_w**2 - \(j*10*s\)**2 * \(mic_w/mic_h\)**2\)\) * 0.85\)
        if x2 > x1:
            draw.line\([x1, y, x2, y], fill=mic_dark, width=max\(1, int\(1*s\)\)\)
    
    # Highlight on mic
    hl_r = int\(8 * s\)
    draw.ellipse\([mic_cx - mic_w + int\(6*s\), mic_cy - mic_h + int\(8*s\), mic_cx - mic_w + int\(6*s\) + hl_r, mic_cy - mic_h + int\(8*s\) + int\(hl_r * 1.5\)], fill=\(180, 255, 248, 200\)\)
    
    # Mic stand/stem
    stem_w = max\(2, int\(6 * s\)\)
    stem_top = mic_cy + mic_h
    stem_bottom = int\(210 * s\)
    draw.rectangle\([mic_cx - stem_w//2, stem_top, mic_cx + stem_w//2, stem_bottom], fill=\(100, 100, 120, 255\)\)
    
    # Mic base \(tripod hint\)
    base_w = int\(28 * s\)
    draw.line\([mic_cx - base_w, stem_bottom + int\(4*s\), mic_cx + base_w, stem_bottom + int\(4*s\)], fill=\(100, 100, 120, 255\), width=max\(2, int\(4*s\)\)\)
    draw.line\([mic_cx, stem_bottom, mic_cx - base_w, stem_bottom + int\(4*s\)], fill=\(100, 100, 120, 255\), width=max\(1, int\(3*s\)\)\)
    draw.line\([mic_cx, stem_bottom, mic_cx + base_w, stem_bottom + int\(4*s\)], fill=\(100, 100, 120, 255\), width=max\(1, int\(3*s\)\)\)
    
    # === REC indicator \(small red dot + "REC" text in top right\) ===
    rec_x = int\(200 * s\)
    rec_y = int\(38 * s\)
    rec_r = int\(8 * s\)
    rec_color = \(255, 59, 92, 255\)  # recording red
    draw.ellipse\([rec_x - rec_r, rec_y - rec_r, rec_x + rec_r, rec_y + rec_r], fill=rec_color\)
    
    # Small glow effect around rec dot
    for gr in range\(3, 0, -1\):
        alpha = 40 * gr
        glow_r = rec_r + int\(gr * 3 * s\)
        glow_img = Image.new\('RGBA', img.size, \(0,0,0,0\)\)
        glow_draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(glow_img\)
        glow_draw.ellipse\([rec_x - glow_r, rec_y - glow_r, rec_x + glow_r, rec_y + glow_r], fill=\(255, 59, 92, min\(255, alpha\)\)\)
        img = Image.alpha_composite\(img, glow_img\)
        draw = ImageDraw.Draw\(img\)
    
    return img

# Create multiple sizes for the ICO
sizes = [256, 128, 64, 48, 32, 16]
images = [create_icon\(s\) for s in sizes]

# Save as ICO
images[0].save\(
    r'C:\\Bronbestanden\\JM-Rec\\jm_rec_icon.ico',
    format='ICO',
    sizes=[\(s, s\) for s in sizes],
    append_images=images[1:]
\)
print\(f"Icon created with sizes: {sizes}"\)
PYEOF)
